description: The "AdPlus.exe" binary that is part of the Windows SDK can be used as a lolbin to dump process memory and execute arbitrary commands
name: Use of Adplus.exe
query: ((process.executable:*\\adplus.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Adplus.exe") AND process.command_line:(*\ \-hang\ * OR *\ \-pn\ * OR *\ \-pmn\ * OR *\ \-p\ * OR *\ \-po\ * OR *\ \-c\ * OR *\ \-sc\ *))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
